original_text: Now these were the people of the province who came up out of the captivity of those exiles whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried captive to Babylonia. They returned to Jerusalem and Judah, each to his own town.
korean_text: 옛적에 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살에게 사로잡혀 바벨론으로 갔던 자들의 자손들 중에서 놓임을 받고 예루살렘과 유다 도로 돌아와 각기 각자의 성읍으로 돌아간 자

sentences.original_text: Now these were the people of the province
who came up out of the captivity of those exiles
sentences.korean_translation: 그 포로들이 포로 생활에서 올라온 사람들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried captive
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살이 사로잡아 간 자들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They returned to Jerusalem and Judah
